title: Newlyweds Zoe Kravitz and Karl Glusman take hand-in-hand stroll through Washington Square Park
text:
Big Little Lies star Zoë Kravitz held hands with her husband Karl Glusman during a romantic stroll through Washington Square Park in Manhattan's Greenwich Village on Wednesday.

The LA-born 30-year-old donned a patterned winter coat over blue jeans and black Mary Janes, while the Bronx-born 31-year-old sported a red Big Trouble in Little China T-shirt and darker blue jeans.

The SUNY Purchase drop-out and the Portland State University drop-out - who met at a bar through mutual pals in 2016 - wed June 29 at her famous father Lenny Kravitz's home in Paris 16 months after getting engaged.

Newlyweds in NYC: Big Little Lies star Zoë Kravitz held hands with her husband Karl Glusman during a romantic stroll through Washington Square Park in Manhattan on Wednesday

'I can be my weirdest self around him': The LA-born 30-year-old (L) donned a patterned winter coat over blue jeans and black Mary Janes, while the Bronx-born 31-year-old (R) sported a red Big Trouble in Little China T-shirt and darker blue jeans

'I can be my weirdest self around [Glusman],' Kravitz gushed to Rolling Stone a year ago.

'It's so relaxing to be around someone where you can be a hundred percent how you feel.'

When Zoë was cast as Selina Kyle/Catwoman in Warner Bros. Pictures' 2021 reboot The Batman on October 14, Karl drew cat ears and a mask over her L'Officiel cover story from March and proudly posted it on Instagram.

'It's super-cool that we're both in DC/Warner Bros.,' her Aquaman stepfather Jason Momoa told Yahoo Entertainment on Wednesday.

Met at a bar through mutual pals in 2016: The SUNY Purchase drop-out and the Portland State University drop-out wed June 29 at her famous father Lenny Kravitz's home in Paris 16 months after getting engaged (pictured September 24)

Proud of his wife! When Zoë was cast as Selina Kyle/Catwoman in Warner Bros. Pictures' 2021 reboot The Batman on October 14, Karl drew cat ears and a mask over her L'Officiel cover story from March and posted it on Instagram

Her Aquaman stepfather Jason Momoa (L) told Yahoo Entertainment on Wednesday: 'It's super-cool that we're both in DC/Warner Bros. She needs no advice. She's so amazing. I'm just excited for her to put in the training' (pictured October 2)

'She needs no advice. She's so amazing. I'm just excited for her to put in the training, and she's going to be amazing at the action. She has so much presence and power, and is a phenomenal actress.'

The Lego Batman Movie and X-Men alum already scored the official blessing from prior Catwomen - Oscar nominee Michelle Pfeiffer, Oscar winner Anne Hathaway, and Oscar winner Halle Berry.

Kravitz begins filming with Robert Pattinson's Batman in late 2019/early 2020 - beating out Alicia Vikander, Zazie Beetz, and Eiza González for the coveted role - according to Variety.

'It's very much a point of view-driven, noir Batman tale,' The Batman director Matt Reeves told THR in January.

Feline femme fatales: The Lego Batman Movie and X-Men alum already scored the official blessing from prior Catwomen - Oscar nominee Michelle Pfeiffer (pictured in 1992), Oscar winner Anne Hathaway, and Oscar winner Halle Berry

53% on Rotten Tomatoes: Karl plays Zazie Beetz's (L) onscreen boyfriend Jeffrey in Babak Anvari's psychological horror flick Wounds, which started streaming last Friday on Hulu/Netflix

'It's told very squarely on his shoulders, and I hope it's going to be a story that will be thrilling but also emotional. It's more Batman in his detective mode than we've seen in the films. The comics have a history of that. He's supposed to be the world's greatest detective, and that's not necessarily been a part of what the movies have been.

'I'd love this to be one where when we go on that journey of tracking down the criminals and trying to solve a crime, it's going to allow his character to have an arc so that he can go through a transformation.'

Meanwhile, Karl plays Zazie Beetz's onscreen boyfriend Jeffrey in Babak Anvari's dismally-reviewed psychological horror flick Wounds, which started streaming last Friday on Hulu/Netflix.

Back in 2015, the 6ft2in actor's breakout role in Gaspar Noé's Love involved full-frontal nudity and unsimulated sex with multiple women.
description: The 30-year-old Big Little Lies star wed the 31-year-old actor on June 29 at her famous father Lenny Kravitz's home in Paris
